title: Trellis Apartments
map_address: 1275 Cunningham rd Sw near Powder Springs Rd
posting_body: ['MARIETTA LIVING IN STYLE', 'We are now accepting in-person tours via scheduled appointments only.', 'Our virtual tours are also available.', 'Please schedule yours today.', 'Come home to Trellis and experience a refreshing take on luxury living in Marietta, GA.', 'This relaxing, pet-friendly community offers comfortable and convenient features designed to help you effortlessly balance your lifestyle.', 'Experience the perfect blend of premium and executive-level upgrades in an array of two and three bedroom apartments and take advantage of resort-inspired amenities that will reward you day after day.', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 37', 'OR Text', '37', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our team directly.', 'Want more info on this unit?', 'See the link (below):', '<URL>', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1240 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Wood-Style Flooring', '- Fireplace', '- Patio/Balcony', '- Large Closets', '- Equipped Kitchens', 'Community Amenities', '- Sundeck', '- Laundry Facilities', '- BBQ & Picnic Area', '- Fitness Center', '- Pool', '- Playground', '- Resort Style Pool', 'Pet Policy', 'We welcome 2 pets per apartment home.', 'There is a $150 pet fee required per pet and $20 monthly pet rent required per pet.', 'There is a non-refundable one time pet fee of $300 for pets 19lbs and under, and pets 20lbs and more have a non-refundable one time fee of $500.', 'Breed restrictions apply.', 'Please call our leasing office for complete pet policy.', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Trellis Apartments', '1275 Cunningham Rd SW, Marietta, GA, 30008', '7ESAIa9qY']
